title: Ensure 'Block ResourceKey Authentication' is enabled
description: Enable 'Block ResourceKey Authentication' in Microsoft Fabric to prevent insecure authentication methods.
rationale: Blocking ResourceKey authentication prevents the use of insecure authentication methods that could be exploited by attackers.
impact: Some legacy integrations may stop working if they rely on ResourceKey authentication.

remediation.text:
1. Navigate to Microsoft Fabric https://app.powerbi.com/admin-portal
2. Select Tenant settings.
3. Scroll to Export and Sharing settings.
4. Enable 'Block ResourceKey Authentication'.
